__e: If any of you idiots... think of taking this to the cops, let me remind you that I am me and you are you, right?
Let me tell you the story of a businessman who ame to my office just a couple of weeks ago and he said,
Yes, I am different from all of you, but I tell you this:
Let me stay for another week or ten days.
And if I do, you let me walk.
Let me tell you the story of a businessman who ame to my office just a couple of weeks ago and he said,
So let's let the police do their job. We'll do ours.
In the eyes of God your are now married. Let the whole world share the new!
Guys, please just stop fighting, okay?
(Optimus Prime) Hold it! Stop fighting! -What in the universe is going on here?
Now stop fighting with each other and let's look for Doc.
Stop thinking that anyone needs you to do more than your job.
Let go of everything outside this room right now.
And stop telling me what I fucking can't do.
Leave my son alone, he's just a boy.
Leave God where he is, for the love of Him and me.
But next time... keep my sister away from all this.
All right, carefully place your weapons on the floor, put your hands behind your heads,
Keep the wine in the bag "until you get home"
